posts.post_content:
This card is disgusting.   
  
RDW's? Not anymore.   
  
U/W flash? No more block tricks.   
  
Various other aggro decks have hasty creatures to speed them along early game.   
  
The extort is going to do so much work the longer this enchantment sticks around. I'll be using three or four main board.   
  
P.S. *'dat art.* 5/5.

Posted By: wholelottalove (1/29/2013 8:02:18 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This card is for agro imo  
It stops blockers makes every nonland card relevant  
For burn it takes 7 cards that are 3 damage per card  
It takes 5 cards for 4 damage a peace  
Creatures are a gamble in that they deal 0 to any amount per turn  
With hasters and no blockers your looking at at least 4 damage  
  
Basically this is a math card of incremental and not so obvious relevence  
It makes each card relevent abd allows you to attack  
  
I think its incredible

Posted By: formula5 (1/30/2013 7:18:20 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I think this could be at the heart of a slow, grindy control deck. It slows the opponent down by a turn forever if it stays on board, has an ability tacked onto it that will actually win the game for you, and it isn't a dead card if you draw multiples because it gives you an additional extort trigger. Potentially a major sleeper card in this set.

posts.post_content:
I love this card 5/5.  
  
This card is going to become a staple in multiple formats. It has a good cast cost and is one sided.   
  
In standard it will be used to prevent flash blocking shenanigans with [Restoration Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Restoration Angel), creatures with haste such as [Thundermaw Hellkite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thundermaw Hellkite) and [Obzedat, Ghost Council](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Obzedat, Ghost Council), and a little bit for the extort.   
  
In modern it will shut down recycle decks like Eggs.
posts.html:
I love this card 5/5.

In standard it will be used to prevent flash blocking shenanigans with Restoration Angel, creatures with haste such as Thundermaw Hellkite and Obzedat, Ghost Council, and a little bit for the extort.

In modern it will shut down recycle decks like Eggs.
